Description:
Detects possible Java payloads in web access logs

Author: frack113, Harjot Singh, "@cyb3rjy0t" (update)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Java Payload Strings
Query: ("%24%7B%28%23a%3D%40" OR "${(#a=@" OR "%24%7B%40java" OR "${@java" OR "u0022java" OR "%2F%24%7B%23" OR "/${#" OR "new+java." OR "getRuntime().exec(" OR "getRuntime%28%29.exec%28")
